Class Application

java.lang.Object
Application
public class Application extends Object
Entity.

Represents an application made by an applicant for a specific project. Tracks the application status, flat type selected, and withdrawal requests.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Applicant
    applicant
    The applicant who made the application.
    private String
    appliedStatus
    The current status of the application (e.g., Pending, Successful, Unsuccessful).
    private int
    flatType
    The flat type selected by the applicant (e.g., 2 for 2-room, 3 for 3-room).
    private final Project
    project
    The project for which the application is made.
    private boolean
    withdrawalRequest
    Indicates whether a withdrawal request has been made.
    private String
    withdrawalStatus
    The status of the withdrawal request (e.g., Pending, Success, Failed).

  • Field Details

    • project

      private final Project project
      The project for which the application is made.

    • applicant

      private final Applicant applicant
      The applicant who made the application.

    • appliedStatus

      private String appliedStatus
      The current status of the application (e.g., Pending, Successful, Unsuccessful).

    • flatType

      private int flatType
      The flat type selected by the applicant (e.g., 2 for 2-room, 3 for 3-room). Defaults to -1 if not set.

    • withdrawalRequest

      private boolean withdrawalRequest
      Indicates whether a withdrawal request has been made.

    • withdrawalStatus

      private String withdrawalStatus
      The status of the withdrawal request (e.g., Pending, Success, Failed).

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      Application(Applicant applicant, Project project)
      Constructs a new application for the specified applicant and project. Initializes the application status to "Pending", flat type to -1, and withdrawal request, withdrawal status to false and "Pending".
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant submitting the application
      project - the project applied to

  • Method Details

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Returns the project associated with this application.
      Returns:
      the Project applied to

    • getApplicant

      public Applicant getApplicant()
      Returns the applicant who made this application.
      Returns:
      the Applicant who applied

    • setAppliedStatus

      public void setAppliedStatus(String status)
      Sets the status of this application. Typical statuses include "Pending", "Successful", or "Unsuccessful".
      Parameters:
      status - the new application status

    • getAppliedStatus

      public String getAppliedStatus()
      Returns the current status of this application.
      Returns:
      the application status

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType(int r)
      Sets the flat type selected for this application.
      Parameters:
      r - the flat type (e.g., 2 for 2-room, 3 for 3-room)

    • getFlatType

      public int getFlatType()
      Returns the flat type selected in this application.
      Returns:
      the flat type as an integer

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Marks this application as having a withdrawal request. Sets the withdrawal status to "Pending".

    • getWithdrawalRequest

      public boolean getWithdrawalRequest()
      Returns whether a withdrawal request has been made.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal requested, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal()
      Approves the withdrawal request, setting the withdrawal status to "Success".

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal()
      Rejects the withdrawal request, resetting the withdrawal request flag and setting status to "Failed".

    • resetWithdrawalStatus

      public void resetWithdrawalStatus()
      Resets the withdrawal status to "Pending".

    • getWithdrawalStatus

      public String getWithdrawalStatus()
      Returns the current withdrawal status.
      Returns:
      the withdrawal status string

    • setWithdrawalStatus

      public void setWithdrawalStatus(String withdrawalStatus)
      Sets the withdrawal status.
      Parameters:
      withdrawalStatus - the new withdrawal status string

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints detailed information about the application to the console. Includes applicant details, project details, flat type, price, availability, and withdrawal request status.
